mapper.select: select a.*, t2.ProjectName as ProjectIDLinkText, t5.TeamName as TeamIDLinkText, t6.real_name as CreateUserIDLinkText, t7.dict_label as StatusLinkText from ach_product a left join Aud_Project t2 on a.ProjectID = t2.ProjectID left join PM_Team t5 on a.TeamID = t5.TeamID join sys_user t6 on a.CreateUserID = t6.user_id left join (select * from sys_dict_data where dict_type = '科技成果状态') t7 on a.Status = t7.dict_value where a.ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ACH_Product ( ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status) values (#{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corperationunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ACH_Product set ProductName = #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProductYear = #{productyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CorperationUnit = #{corperationunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Performance = #{performance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProjectID = #{projectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ProductID, ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Product where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ProductID, ProductName, ProductYear, CorperationUnit, Performance, Memo, ProjectID, TeamID, CreateUserID, CreateTime, Status from ACH_Product
